textBeforeTable: Cost summary Over the 18 month contract period, including line rental and set up costs: £28.24 Average monthly cost £508.32 Total 18 month contracted cost You can save an extra £39.84 by paying for 12 months line rental in advance. Line rental would effectively cost £13.67 per month. UK landline (weekend): Free UK landline (evening): 8.7p per min UK landline (peak): 8.7p per min Call charges (UK landlines) Total: £34.49 Plus line rental: £16.99 Monthly: £17.50 Costs after your contract ends Out of contract costs Total: £21.99 Plus line rental: £16.99 Months 1-9: £5 (months 10-18: £17.50) Monthly costs Delivery cost: Free Connection cost: Free Equipment cost: Free Upfront costs 18 months contract Unlimited usage Up to 50 Mbps superfast fibre broadband Broadband Use Virgin Media's SmartCall app to use your home phone minutes on your mobile over Wi-Fi, even when abroad. Weekend calls to UK landlines included. Free set up when you buy online. Award winning service and the UK's fastest average broadband download speeds. Why this could be the right package for you
textAfterTable: Package costs Monthly £17.50 Setup Free Offer  Up to 50Mb superfast fibre with weekend calls £5 a month for 9m, then £17.50. 1st year cost £97.50 Monthly line rental £16.99 1st year inc. line rental £301.38 Contract length 18 months You can choose to pay 12 months line rental in advance for £164.04, equivalent to a monthly price of £13.67. Up to 50Mb superfast fibre with weekend calls £5 a month for 9m, then £17.50. Offer ends 2nd Aug. Go to site Online exclusive If you don't want to pay a monthly subscription for Sky Sports you can buy one-off passes with Now TV for a set fee. To buy a Now TV box click here Both BT and Sky have the rights to show live Premier League matches until 2017. Sky has the bulk of the matches with 168 games and BT have the remaining 48 matches.
